title: Episode 167: Modesty, Mega-Pastors, and Muslim Prayer Rooms!
description: Listeners get to chime in! Last week's stories led to lots of interesting conversation about modesty, mega-pastors and Muslim prayer rooms, so Phil reads your comments and the gang discusses! What fun!
